00020 
00021 #include "ArrayMedia.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_array;
00024 
00026 #define MEDIA_TYPE_CARTRIDGE std::wstring(L"Cartridge")
00027 
00029 #define MEDIA_TYPE_PLATE_OR_STRIP std::wstring(L"PlateOrStrip")
00030 
00031 /*
00032  * Convert the media type to a string.
00033  */
00034 std::wstring affymetrix_calvin_array::MediaToString(ArrayMedia media)
00035 {
00036         switch (media)
00037         {
00038         case CartridgeMedia:
00039                 return MEDIA_TYPE_CARTRIDGE;
00040                 break;
00041 
00042         case PlateOrStripMedia:
00043                 return MEDIA_TYPE_PLATE_OR_STRIP;
00044                 break;
00045 
00046         default:
00047                 return L"";
00048                 break;
00049         }
00050 }
00051 
00052 /*
00053  * Convert the string to media type.
00054  */
00055 ArrayMedia affymetrix_calvin_array::MediaFromString(const std::wstring &media)
00056 {
00057         if (media == MEDIA_TYPE_CARTRIDGE)
00058                 return CartridgeMedia;
00059         
00060         else if (media == MEDIA_TYPE_PLATE_OR_STRIP)
00061                 return PlateOrStripMedia;
00062 
00063         else
00064                 return CartridgeMedia;
00065 }
